svg.title: CE-03: Intelligent Technical Debt Management System
svg.desc: Comprehensive technical debt management platform that identifies, prioritizes, and tracks technical debt remediation with ROI analysis and automated monitoring. Transforms technical debt from invisible burden into manageable asset through systematic identification, measurement, and strategic remediation planning.
svg.text: Comprehensive debt identification, prioritization, and ROI-driven remediation planning

g.text: Intelligent Priority Matrix - Impact vs Effort
• Automated quality validation on every commit
• AI-powered code review suggestions and mentoring
• 92% of developers now proactively identify and address debt
• Technical debt discussion integrated into all planning sessions
• Code review quality improved with debt-awareness checklist
• Systematic refactoring now part of regular development flow
